title: Automotive ECU Simpson
description: Real-time ECU simulator using FreeRTOS & Bare-metal drivers (MCAL) for CAN/I2C.

title: Wake Word Detection
description: Hybrid CNN-BiLSTM engine with INT8 Quantization on Raspberry Pi (>95% F1-score).

title: Smart Home IoT Core
description: Smart energy management system for apartments. Uses MQTT protocol to ensure low latency (< 50ms).

title: Altium Power Shield
description: High power power supply circuit design (Buck/Boost Converter). Optimized 4-layer layout to reduce EMI noise.

title: STM32 Balancing Robot
description: Two-wheeled self-balancing robot using MPU6050 IMU sensor. Applied Kalman filter and PID algorithm.
